column4: ok, this shit is getting really weird. I've spent all night on it.
SD card is magically mounting from fuckign nowhere.
Considering a billion people have issues with their SD cards mounting as read only, someone would be able to help me do the same.
How do I find out where my SD card is located in /dev?
How do I find out where the SD card is mounted when it's mounted?
tells u what is mounted and where
lists a bunch of stuff and none of them are the sd card.
if u type that into a terminal it does tell u what is mounted and where
i guess your card ain't mounted then
afaik mount tells u what and where
I'd like it to not automount, it's mounting anyway and I can't tell where.
